com.Interface.Department.dao

Interface DepartmentDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DepartmentDAOImpl

    public interface DepartmentDAO
    Contains methods to handle database operation and interact directly with it. for Department component.

    It have five main methods for: adding new Department, update a Department, gets all Departments, get Department by ID and Delete a Department.

    Author:
    Ahmed A.Moniem Hassan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDepartment(Department department)
      Adding new Department by taking an Department object and submit it's properties value to saved as a record in database.
      java.util.List<Department> allDepartments()
      Get all Departments from database.
      void deleteDepartment(int dep_id)
      Delete Department with the given Department ID from database.
      Department getDepartmentByID(int dep_id)
      Get Department by the given Department ID.
      void updateDepartment(Department department)
      Updating/Editing an Department by taking an Department object, take the given id property with the object to search for it's record in database, and change record data with other object properties value.

    • Method Detail

      • addDepartment

        void addDepartment(Department department)
        Adding new Department by taking an Department object and submit it's properties value to saved as a record in database.
        Parameters:
        Department - object contains the data that must be saved.

      • updateDepartment

        void updateDepartment(Department department)
        Updating/Editing an Department by taking an Department object, take the given id property with the object to search for it's record in database, and change record data with other object properties value.
        Parameters:
        Department - object contains the data that must be updated.

      • getDepartmentByID

        Department getDepartmentByID(int dep_id)
        Get Department by the given Department ID.
        Parameters:
        Department - ID.
        Returns:
        Department Object.

      • allDepartments

        java.util.List<Department> allDepartments()
        Get all Departments from database.
        Returns:
        List of Department Objects.

      • deleteDepartment

        void deleteDepartment(int dep_id)
        Delete Department with the given Department ID from database.
        Parameters:
        Department - ID.
